Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation occurrences across all cases
Percentage of variants that include SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' out of all cases

Name: Number of times SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation is immediately preceded by SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation that is followed by SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' out of all 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Frequency of SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation in comparison to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation occurrences relative to SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Number of variants where SW-Reviewer Agreed directly leads to SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases containing SW-Reviewer Agreed that eventually reach SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Frequency of SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation in cases that experienced at least one reviewer decline (e.g., SW-Reviewer Declined or SW-Reviewer No Response)
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation that occurs after multiple SW-AE Assign Reviewers attempts
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' out of all 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Number of SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation instances that occur more than 7 days after the first SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation among all “awaiting”-type activities (e.g., SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion, SW-Awaiting AE Assignment, SW-Awaiting EIC Decision)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation in manuscripts that ultimately result in SW-EIC Major Revision versus SW-EIC Accept
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' activities for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Major Revision' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation that appears in the longest-running variants (top 10% by duration)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' out of all cases
